Controller - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller
The controller which mediates between the external model and the virtual view
Controller(List<VirtualView>, Model) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.Controller
This is the constructor of the controller: for each given virtual view the controller subscribes to all the possible packets coming from that view and forwards them to the Model Eventually, upon rejection of the packet by the model, the controller notifies the failure back the virtual view
